name: Answers Lie In The Past
description:
Make your way through the dungeon and use the past to slip past obstacles and change the present.

Made for UC Davis Game Jam Spring 2022

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys: Left, Right, Up, Down Movement

Shift: Sprint

E: Interact

Space: Time Shift

Note: Web GL not working so please download.

Assets Used:

https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-dungeon-pack

https://oddpotatogift.itch.io/16x16-fantasy-pack
